title: I am class 11 student and I am good at physics and biology but I have not prepared for chemistry at all yet. What should I do? - Quora

response.answer_text: Dude… Please focus on chemistry…its the easiest and most scoring subject. U can give a tons of time to physics and in return what do you get a penny of results. Start focusing on chemistry.. Specially inorganic chem. See…for neet exam.. U need atleast 550 to get the best college of ur state and even to some of the well reputed ones. To practically score this much.. What u need js a strategy and a back support of previous topics. Chemistry is easiest for you… U don't need to give too much of time.. Just give atleast an hour a day to it and in return what u'll get is important.

Chemistry is subject which demands lot of reading so its always recommended that you take your time and read each and everything that’s given in the text, if as a shortcut you can go through the question banks which have almost all the content of chapters covered.
